CHICAGO,IL
CONCERT HALL
City Winery
Nestled in the infamous West Loop, City Winery Chicago is a unique facility, combining a fully functioning winery with intimate concerts, food & wine classes, private events in a variety of configurations, and fine dining. We have created a compelling mix for our sophisticated clientel of foodies, and active cultural patrons - bringing the wine country experience to the middle of a large city.

“It has a separate concert hall that hosts first rate shows and a large courtyard for dining alfresco.”
